entries.description: KubeVirt cloud provider support is GA now. Manual migration is required, check out the changelog for details.
OperatingSystemProfiles and OperatingSystemConfigs have been moved to user clusters. CustomOperatingSystemProfiles have been introduced to maintain custom profiles at the Seed level.
Helm support for Applications has been updated to 3.11. Due to possible CVEs, the template function getHostByName is disabled by default and needs to be enabled explicitly.
Support for Kubernetes 1.25 and Kubernetes 1.26.
Add a web terminal to directly interact with user cluster APIs.
Support for importing KubeOne clusters.
Add group information to OIDC kubeconfig.
Preset availability can be limited to specific projects.
Support for external CCM & CSI drivers in AWS. New clusters default to this, existing clusters need to be CCM migrated.
Support for GCP CSI Driver in Kubernetes 1.25+ clusters.
Support for using server groups with OpenStack.
Support for DigitalOcean external CCM.
Add Canal CNI v3.24.
Add Cilium CNI v1.13.0.
Konnectivity (to connect cluster control plane and cluster nodes) is updated to v0.0.35, is now GA and enabled by default.
Upstream Kubernetes images are pulled from registry.k8s.io instead of k8s.gcr.io.
By default, external CCM is turned on for all providers that support it.
Default to Ubuntu 22.04 if Ubuntu is used as operating system.
Update vSphere CSI driver to v2.7.0.
Update KubeVirt CCM to v0.4.0.
Update OpenStack Cinder CSI to v1.24.5 and v1.25.3.
Update Cilium to v1.12.2 and v1.11.9.
Update MetalLB to v0.13.7.
Update k8s-dns-node-cache to 1.22.13.
Update to etcd 3.5.6.
Allow Kubernetes version upgrade for clusters with non-amd64 nodes & Canal CNI and IPVS for all k8s versions.
Fix OpenStack cloud provider tenant to project fields migration.
Persist annotations when upgrading a cluster.
Fix KubeVirt LoadBalancers not accessible from outside the user cluster.
Fix a race condition for etcd-launcher preventing the last etcd node from joining.
Fix default tunnelingAgentIP for Tunneling expose strategy.
Container runtime configuration is properly validated while creating or upgrading clusters.
Disable promtail initContainer that was overriding system fs.inotify.max_user_instances configuration.
Fix an issue where creating Clusters through ClusterTemplates failed without leaving a trace.
Fix user-ssh-keys-agent Docker image for arm64 containing the amd64 binary.
Fix DNAT controller not installing NAT rules for big clusters.
Properly clean up Kubernetes Dashboard resources in the user cluster if the Kubernetes Dashboard is disabled.
Fix a bug in metering that lead to outdated Project and/or Cluster labels in reports.
Support for Kubernetes 1.22 and Kubernetes 1.23.
Support for Docker as container runtime.
Support for SLES as operating system.
Support for dynamic kubelet configuration.
Support for Pod Security Policy Admission Plugin with Kubernetes 1.25.
machine-controller's built-in user data to provision new nodes is deprecated with this release and will be removed in a future release. OSM is the recommended way to generate user data.
